properties.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 6 at 2:25PM EST until January 7 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of
2 to 7 inches. Storm totals today through tonight up to 10
inches.

* WHERE...Northern Herkimer and Hamilton Counties.

* WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of heavy lake effect snow will
continue through this evening. The snow will taper off after
midnight.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

NWSheadline: LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST TUESDAY
